verses.verse: And all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265> from the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin<WH5512>, after their journeys<WH4550>, according to the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068>, and pitched<WH2583> in Rephidim<WH7508>: and there was no water<WH4325> for the people<WH5971> to drink<WH8354>.

Wherefore the people<WH5971> did chide<WH7378> with Moses<WH4872>, and said<WH559>, Give<WH5414> us water<WH4325> that we may drink<WH8354>. And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto them, Why chide<WH7378> ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt<WH5254> the LORD<WH3068>?

And the people<WH5971> thirsted<WH6770> there for water<WH4325>; and the people<WH5971> murmured<WH3885> against Moses<WH4872>, and said<WH559>, Wherefore is this that thou hast brought<WH5927> us up out of Egypt<WH4714>, to kill<WH4191> us and our children<WH1121> and our cattle<WH4735> with thirst<WH6772>?
And Moses<WH4872> cried<WH6817> unto the LORD<WH3068>, saying<WH559>, What shall I do<WH6213> unto this people<WH5971>? they be almost<WH4592> ready to stone<WH5619> me.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Go on<WH5674> before<WH6440> the people<WH5971>, and take<WH3947> with thee of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>; and thy rod<WH4294>, wherewith thou smotest<WH5221> the river<WH2975>, take<WH3947> in thine hand<WH3027>, and go<WH1980>.

Behold, I will stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> thee there upon the rock<WH6697> in Horeb<WH2722>; and thou shalt smite<WH5221> the rock<WH6697>, and there shall come<WH3318> water<WH4325> out of it, that the people<WH5971> may drink<WH8354>. And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> so in the sight<WH5869> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>.

And he called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the place<WH4725> Massah<WH4532>, and Meribah<WH4809>, because of the chiding<WH7379> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and because they tempted<WH5254> the LORD<WH3068>, saying<WH559>, Is<WH3426> the LORD<WH3068> among<WH7130> us, or not? Massah: that is, Temptation Meribah: that is, Chiding, or, Strife
Then came<WH935> Amalek<WH6002>, and fought<WH3898> with Israel<WH3478> in Rephidim<WH7508>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Choose us out<WH977> men<WH582>, and go out<WH3318>, fight<WH3898> with Amalek<WH6002>: to morrow<WH4279> I will stand<WH5324> on the top<WH7218> of the hill<WH1389> with the rod<WH4294> of God<WH430> in mine hand<WH3027>. Joshua: called Jesus

So Joshua<WH3091> did<WH6213> as Moses<WH4872> had said<WH559> to him, and fought<WH3898> with Amalek<WH6002>: and Moses<WH4872>, Aaron<WH175>, and Hur<WH2354> went up<WH5927> to the top<WH7218> of the hill<WH1389>.
And it came to pass, when Moses<WH4872> held up<WH7311> his hand<WH3027>, that Israel<WH3478> prevailed<WH1396>: and when he let down<WH5117> his hand<WH3027>, Amalek<WH6002> prevailed<WH1396>.

But Moses'<WH4872> hands<WH3027> were heavy<WH3515>; and they took<WH3947> a stone<WH68>, and put<WH7760> it under him, and he sat<WH3427> thereon; and Aaron<WH175> and Hur<WH2354> stayed up<WH8551> his hands<WH3027>, the one on the one side<WH259>, and the other on the other side<WH259>; and his hands<WH3027> were steady<WH530> until the going down<WH935> of the sun<WH8121>.
And Joshua<WH3091> discomfited<WH2522> Amalek<WH6002> and his people<WH5971> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Write<WH3789> this for a memorial<WH2146> in a book<WH5612>, and rehearse<WH7760> it in the ears<WH241> of Joshua<WH3091>: for I will utterly<WH4229> put out<WH4229> the remembrance<WH2143> of Amalek<WH6002> from under heaven<WH8064>.
And Moses<WH4872> built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196>, and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of it Jehovahnissi<WH3071>: Jehovahnissi: that is, The LORD my banner

For he said<WH559>, Because the LORD<WH3050> hath sworn<WH3027> <WH3676> that the LORD<WH3068> will have war<WH4421> with Amalek<WH6002> from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755>. Because: or, Because the hand of Amalek is against the throne of the LORD, therefore, etc the LORD hath: Heb. the hand upon the throne of the LORD
